#Overview

= Introduction =

Automatic pixel generator is a python program for automatically generating some types of pixel art.

= Current Features =

  * Generate spaceships

Currently to change any options you need to alter the code.

= Future Features =

  * GUI and command line interface
  * More options, colouring, size
  * Planets, People
  * Tilesets, paths, grass, trees, walls etc

= Language and Libraries =

Python, Pygame
